q: Allen Iverson returned to the game. Rasheed Wallace 's 3-pointer with 10.4 seconds left ended a nearly 7-minute scoring drought. Rip Hamilton 's two free throws with 3.8 seconds to go avoided a monumental collapse from a 29-point third-quarter lead. Honestly, I didn't want to go back in, said Allen Iverson , who scored 20 points through three quarters. ''I felt that our second team should have closed that thing out.'' Allen Iverson said he wanted to check in as a group of mostly Bobcats reserves

Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said. ''These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.
